blogPost.excerpt: Chocolate is sweet but SaaS surprises are sweeter - and we have two a day! At the stroke of midnight SaaS Advent Calendar unlocks an exclusive deal from well-established SaaS companies as well as a free SaaS in beta that needs valuable feedback.
blogPost.body: Chocolate is sweet but SaaS surprises are sweeter - and we have two a day! At the stroke of midnight SaaS Advent Calendar unlocks an exclusive deal from well-established SaaS companies as well as a free SaaS in beta that needs valuable feedback.
blogPost.title: SaaS Advent Calendar 2020 - SaaSanta is coming to town and he's not bringing coal
blogPost.author: Alex. Delivet

localize.description: 巧克力是甜的，但SaaS惊喜更甜-我们每天吃两个！午夜钟声敲响之际，SaaS Advent Calendar解锁了来自知名SaaS公司的独家交易，以及需要宝贵反馈的免费测试版SaaS。
localize.tagline: 萨亚圣诞老人要来镇上，他不会带煤来

localize.description: 巧克力是甜的，但SaaS驚喜更甜-我們每天喫兩個！午夜鐘聲敲響之際，SaaS Advent Calendar解鎖了來自知名SaaS公司的獨家交易，以及需要寶貴反饋的免費測試版SaaS。
localize.tagline: 薩亞聖誕老人要來鎮上，他不會帶煤來
